content.rendered:
I have recently earned an M.Tech degree in Computer Science from IIT Kharagpur. Prior to this, I have worked with TATA Consultancy Services, and have been a Microsoft Student Partner. I graduated with a B.Tech degree in Information Technology from Techno India, Kolkata, and did my schooling from Indira Gandhi Memorial High School till 10th standard and for the next 2 years, I studied at Bhavan’s Gangabux Kanoria Vidyamandir. Certified as Microsoft Certified Professional, I have published research papers in leading conferences.

I am primarily interested in opportunities in Research and Development profiles. While the focus of my present work is on Cloud Computing and Data Analytics, I also have experience in Web/App development and Adobe Experience Manager (AEM). My other areas of interest include cryptography, network security, AI, data management, and process optimisation.

Apart from being selected as an MSP, I’ve been a founder of the technical club of the Department of Information Technology at college, InspirIT. As an active member, I organised sessions for students on technologies which are not covered in university curriculum but are nonetheless quite important in today’s market.

I like to learn by exploring and take an active interest in modifying configurations of different software in order to get a better understanding of their working procedure. I enjoy going through tech blogs, and sharing knowledge via social media & my personal blog.

One of my early publications was on “A Social Networking Model for Learning through Web Net” published in AICTE sponsored National Conference. Ranked 3rd in West Bengal in MBD Talent Search Examination 2004-05, I have also been School Topper in AISSE (CBSE-Class X) examination, and have bagged prizes at various competitions. I have experience in developing for multiple platforms, and my apps are available for download on Windows Store & Windows Phone Marketplace. I have sound knowledge on J2EE development, and my prime interest is in Operating Systems and DBMS.

During college days, I have been a Representative to the Placement Cell. Hopefully, this adds on to my experience in team management as my status as Prefect and House Captain at school.

I look forward to connecting with people and sharing memorable experiences with them.

A few words from my associates, partners and clients:

[gs_testimonial]
